write_dodgr_wt_profile

Source: R/weighting_profiles.R
write_dodgr_wt_profile.Rd

Write the dodgr street network weighting profiles to a local .json-formatted file for manual editing and subsequent re-reading.

write_dodgr_wt_profile(file = NULL)

Arguments

file

Full name (including path) of file to which to write. The .json suffix will be automatically appended.

Value

TRUE if writing successful.

See also

weight_streetnet

Other misc: compare_heaps(), dodgr_flowmap(), dodgr_full_cycles(), dodgr_fundamental_cycles(), dodgr_insert_vertex(), dodgr_sample(), dodgr_sflines_to_poly(), dodgr_vertices(), match_points_to_graph(), match_pts_to_graph(), merge_directed_graph(), summary.dodgr_dists_categorical()
